Name: limestone quarry operation | limestone, unprocessed | EN15804GD, U
Category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/081:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay/0810:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay
Description: Building machines operates with diesel. Extrapolation: In Quebec, 65% of the extraction is made using Ammonia explosive, and 35% using gelatin explosive. The tovex explosive was used as a proxy in this module. CO, SO2 and NOx emissions reported by the company were excluded from the dataset, since related to diesel and explosive combustion (and included in the "diesel,  burned in building machine" and  "blasting" datasets).
Tags: single enterprise data,Sector: Resource Extraction; Minerals; Cement & Concrete
